# GitHub Repository About Section

Use the following information to configure your GitHub repository's "About" section:

## Description

```
A modern, customizable landing page boilerplate built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Perfect for quickly launching new products or services.
```

## Topics/Tags

Add these topics to help others discover your repository:

- `landing-page`
- `react`
- `boilerplate`
- `tailwindcss`
- `framer-motion`
- `google-cloud-run`
- `docker`
- `webpack`
- `javascript`
- `frontend`
- `template`

## How to Set This Up

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About" on the right sidebar
3. Enter the description in the "Description" field
4. Add topics by typing them in the "Topics" field
5. (Optional) Add your website URL
6. Click "Save changes"
